items.content_html: This PR renames a few subfeatures of the toLocaleString methods to reflect BCD conventions, by adding a _parameter suffix to them.
items.title: Fix identifiers for toLocaleString parameters

items.content_html:
FF121 added support for a :state() pseudo selector in FF121 in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1861466

This adds a feature for :state().

Related docs work can be tracked in mdn/content#31971
items.title: FF121 CSS :state() pseudo class

items.content_html:
The Firefox-only options.locale argument to IDBObjectStore.createIndex() is now deprecated by https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1872675 in FF123.

This adds the option as a subfeature and marks it deprecated. This is in preparation for expected removal at some point. Either way it is more correct than having this info in the docs.

Related docs work can be tracked in mdn/content#31915
items.title: FF123 IDBObjectStore.createIndex() locale option deprecated

items.content_html:
Summary

Compatibility data for browserAction.getUserSetting which was added in Bug 1814905 "Implement chrome.action.getUserSettings" but missed from the original documentation update.
items.title: Adding details for browserAction.getUserSettings

items.content_html:
FF122 started using a different URL parser in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1603699. Previously if you passed in an URL with an unknown scheme/protocol in URL(), the host, hostname and port would be empty strings. Now these values are populated (as discussed in mdn/content#31100 (comment)).

This adds a note about the change. Didn't seem worthwhile to add a completely new version for this (originally I thought this had no developer impact).

Related docs work can be tracked in mdn/content#31100
items.title: FF122 URL() now parses host/hostname/port for unknown schemes

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the -webkit-mask-repeat-y CSS property. The data comes from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v10.7.1).

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
